message.raw:
move wait monitor error checking to compilation time, and ensure that
start_order and stop_order of separate wait monitor timeout and acquisition
devices are configured as required to ensure that the subprocess otherwise
belonging to the acquisition device will be able to control the timeout device
without contention from tasks in the other process.
